Sets the desired SNIServerNames of the Server Name Indication (SNI) parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置服务器名称指示（SNI）参数的所需 SNIServerName 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein.

Sets the desired assertion status for the named top-level class in this class loader and any nested classes contained therein. This setting takes precedence over the class loader's default assertion status, and over any applicable per-package default. This method has no effect if the named class has already been initialized. (Once a class is initialized, its assertion status cannot change.)
trans-unit.target: 设置该类加载器中命名的顶层类和其中包含的任何嵌套类的所需断言状态。这个设置优先于类加载器的默认断言状态,也优先于任何适用的每个包的默认状态。如果命名的类已经被初始化,那么这个方法就没有效果。(一旦一个类被初始化,它的断言状态就不能改变。)

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired byte order for future reads of data values from this stream.

Sets the desired byte order for future reads of data values from this stream. For example, the sequence of bytes '0x01 0x02 0x03 0x04' if read as a 4-byte integer would have the value '0x01020304' using network byte order and the value '0x04030201' under the reverse byte order.
trans-unit.target: 设置未来从该流读取数据值时所需的字节顺序。例如,字节序列'0x01 0x02 0x03 0x04'如果以 4 字节整数读取,则使用网络字节顺序时,其值为'0x01020304',反之则为'0x04030201'。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired image type for the destination image, using an ImageTypeSpecifier.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageTypeSpecifier 设置目标图像的所需图像类型。

trans-unit.source: Sets the destination to the given ImageOutputStream or other Object.

Sets the destination to the given ImageOutputStream or other Object. The destination is assumed to be ready to accept data, and will not be closed at the end of each write. This allows distributed imaging applications to transmit a series of images over a single network connection. If output is null, any currently set output will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 将目标设置为给定的 ImageOutputStream 或其他 Object 。假定目标已准备好接受数据，并且不会在每次写入结束时关闭。这允许分布式成像应用程序通过单个网络连接传输一系列图像。如果 output 为 null ，则将删除任何当前设置的输出。

trans-unit.source: Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the two specified coordinates.
Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the two specified coordinates. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on two specified Point2D objects.
Sets the diagonal of the framing rectangle of this Shape based on two specified Point2D objects. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
Sets the difference mode flag value common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans共有的差异模式标志值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the difference mode flag value.
trans-unit.target: 设置差分模式标志值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the differing notification's on/off switch value common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans通用的不同通知的开/关开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the differing notification's on/off switch value.
trans-unit.target: 设置不同通知的开启/关闭开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the direction of the arrow.
Sets the direction.
Sets the directory name.
Sets the directory of this file dialog window to be the specified directory.

Sets the directory of this file dialog window to be the specified directory. Specifying a null or an invalid directory implies an implementation-defined default. This default will not be realized, however, until the user has selected a file. Until this point, getDirectory() will return the value passed into this method.
Sets the directory used by the library loader for storing native libraries before they are loaded into memory.
trans-unit.target: 设置库加载器在将本地库加载到内存之前用于存储本地库的目录。

trans-unit.source: Sets the directory where cache files are to be created.

Sets the directory where cache files are to be created. A value of null indicates that the system-dependent default temporary-file directory is to be used. If getUseCache returns false, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 设置要在其中创建缓存文件的目录。值为 null 表示将使用系统相关的默认临时文件目录。如果 getUseCache 返回false，则忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the disabled icon at index to icon which can be null.
Sets the disabled icon at index to icon which can be null. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
Sets the disabled icon for the button.
Sets the disabled selection icon for the button.
Sets the display mode of this graphics device.

Sets the display mode of this graphics device. This is only allowed if isDisplayChangeSupported() returns true and may require first entering full-screen exclusive mode using setFullScreenWindow(java.awt.Window) providing that full-screen exclusive mode is supported (i.e., isFullScreenSupported() returns true).
Sets the divider location as a percentage of the JSplitPane's size.
Sets the divider to use when the JSplitPane is configured to not continuously layout.

Sets the divider to use when the JSplitPane is configured to not continuously layout. This divider will only be used during a dragging session. It is recommended that the passed in component be a heavy weight.
Sets the divider to use.
Sets the drag image parameter.
Sets the drag image parameter. The image has to be prepared for rendering by the moment of the call. The image is stored by reference because of some performance reasons.
Sets the drop action for the transfer - which must represent a drop - to the given action, instead of the default user drop action.

Sets the drop action for the transfer - which must represent a drop - to the given action, instead of the default user drop action. The action must be supported by the source's drop actions, and must be one of COPY, MOVE or LINK.
Sets the drop mode for this component.

Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of DropMode.INSERT is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. It offers similar behavior of dropping between text locations, but does so without affecting the actual text selection and caret location.

Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the list.

Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the table.

Sets the drop mode for this component. For backward compatibility, the default for this property is DropMode.USE_SELECTION. Usage of one of the other modes is recommended, however, for an improved user experience. DropMode.ON, for instance, offers similar behavior of showing items as selected, but does so without affecting the actual selection in the tree.
Sets the east pane.
Sets the echo character for this JPasswordField.

Sets the echo character for this JPasswordField. Note that this is largely a suggestion, since the view that gets installed can use whatever graphic techniques it desires to represent the field. Setting a value of 0 indicates that you wish to see the text as it is typed, similar to the behavior of a standard JTextField.
Sets the echo character for this text field.
Sets the editor to used by when a cell in this column is edited.
Sets the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field.

Sets the editor used to paint and edit the selected item in the JComboBox field. The editor is used only if the receiving JComboBox is editable. If not editable, the combo box uses the renderer to paint the selected item.
Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setOpaque(java.lang.Object...).
Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setRelease(java.lang.Object...).
Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory effects as specified by VarHandle.setVolatile(java.lang.Object...).
Sets the element at index i to newValue, with memory semantics of setting as if the variable was declared non-volatile and non-final.
Sets the element at position i to the given value.
trans-unit.target: 将位置 i 的元素设置为给定值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the attribute specified.

Sets the element at the position specified to be the attribute specified. The previous element at that position is discarded. If the index is out of range (index < 0 || index > size()) a RuntimeOperationsException should be raised, wrapping the java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置的元素设置为指定的属性。该位置上的先前元素将被丢弃。如果索引超出范围（索引<0 ||索引> size（）），则应引发RuntimeOperationsException，并包装引发的java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the role specified.
Sets the element at the position specified to be the role specified. The previous element at that position is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置上的元素设置为指定的角色。该位置的前一个元素将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element at the position specified to be the unresolved role specified.
Sets the element at the position specified to be the unresolved role specified. The previous element at that position is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 将指定位置上的元素设置为指定的未解析角色。该位置的前一个元素将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Sets the element type.
Sets the enabled state of the Action.

Sets the enabled state of the Action. When enabled, any component associated with this object is active and able to fire this object's actionPerformed method. If the value has changed, a PropertyChangeEvent is sent to listeners.
Sets the enabled state of the object.
Sets the end index.
Sets the end index. For use by subclasses of Format.
trans-unit.target: 设置结束索引。供 Format 的子类使用。

trans-unit.source: Sets the end of a Range to be after a node
Sets the end position to be before a node.
Sets the endpoint identification algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 设置端点识别算法。

trans-unit.source: Sets the entire Vector of parameters to a given Vector.
Sets the entire Vector of sources to a given Vector.
Sets the environment that will be returned when getEnvironment() is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置调用getEnvironment()时将返回的环境。

trans-unit.source: Sets the error state of the stream to true.
trans-unit.target: 将流的错误状态设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Sets the exception handler for this stream to exceptionListener.
Sets the exception handler for this stream to exceptionListener. The exception handler is notified when this stream catches recoverable exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 将此流的异常处理程序设置为 exceptionListener 。当此流捕获可恢复的异常时，将通知异常处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Sets the executor to be used for asynchronous and dependent tasks.
Sets the expanded icon.
Sets the expanded state of this JTree.

Sets the expanded state of this JTree. If state is true, all parents of path and path are marked as expanded. If state is false, all parents of path are marked EXPANDED, but path itself is marked collapsed.
Sets the explanation associated with the problem encounter when resolving a link.
trans-unit.target: 设置解决链接时遇到的问题的相关解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the explanation associated with the problem encountered when resolving a link.
Sets the extendedKeyUsage criterion.

Sets the extendedKeyUsage criterion. The X509Certificate must allow the specified key purposes in its extended key usage extension. If keyPurposeSet is empty or null, no extendedKeyUsage check will be done. Note that an X509Certificate that has no extendedKeyUsage extension implicitly allows all key purposes.
trans-unit.target: 设置extendedKeyUsage标准。在 X509Certificate 必须允许在其扩展密钥用法扩展指定键的目的。如果 keyPurposeSet 为空或 null ，则将不执行extendedKeyUsage检查。请注意，没有extendedKeyUsage扩展名的 X509Certificate 隐式地允许所有密钥用途。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extensible list of properties associated with this image.
Sets the extension for the given key.
Sets the extension for the given key. If the value is null or the empty string, the extension is removed. Otherwise, the extension must be well-formed or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定密钥的扩展名。如果值为null或空字符串，则扩展名将被删除。否则，扩展名必须格式正确，否则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Sets the extent to
Sets the failure handler to be called by the RMI runtime if server socket creation fails.

Sets the failure handler to be called by the RMI runtime if server socket creation fails. By default, if no failure handler is installed and server socket creation fails, the RMI runtime does attempt to recreate the server socket.
Sets the fetch size for this RowSet object to the given number of rows.

Sets the fetch size for this RowSet object to the given number of rows. The fetch size gives a JDBC technology-enabled driver ("JDBC driver") a hint as to the number of rows that should be fetched from the database when more rows are needed for this RowSet object. If the fetch size specified is zero, the driver ignores the value and is free to make its own best guess as to what the fetch size should be.
Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value.
Sets the field of the given object managed by this updater to the given updated value. This operation is guaranteed to act as a volatile store with respect to subsequent invocations of compareAndSet.
trans-unit.target: 将此更新程序管理的给定对象的字段设置为给定的更新值。对于后续的 compareAndSet 调用，保证此操作充当易失性存储。

trans-unit.source: Sets the field represented by this Field object on the specified object argument to the specified new value.
Sets the field represented by this Field object on the specified object argument to the specified new value. The new value is automatically unwrapped if the underlying field has a primitive type.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Field 对象在指定对象参数上表示的字段设置为指定的新值。如果基础字段具有原始类型，则新值将自动展开。

trans-unit.source: Sets the fields of the URL argument to the indicated values.
Sets the fields of the URL argument to the indicated values. Only classes derived from URLStreamHandler are able to use this method to set the values of the URL fields.
trans-unit.target: 将 URL 参数的字段设置为指示的值。只有派生自URLStreamHandler的类才能使用此方法来设置URL字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the file chooser to allow multiple file selections.
Sets the file name.
Sets the file system view that the JFileChooser uses for accessing and creating file system resources, such as finding the floppy drive and getting a list of root drives.
Sets the file view to be used to retrieve UI information, such as the icon that represents a file or the type description of a file.
Sets the file-pointer offset, measured from the beginning of this file, at which the next read or write occurs.

Sets the file-pointer offset, measured from the beginning of this file, at which the next read or write occurs. The offset may be set beyond the end of the file. Setting the offset beyond the end of the file does not change the file length. The file length will change only by writing after the offset has been set beyond the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 设置文件指针的偏移量,从文件的开头开始测量,下一次读或写发生的时间。偏移量可以设置在文件结束之后。将偏移量设置在文件结束后,不会改变文件长度。只有在偏移量被设置到文件末尾之外后,通过写入才会改变文件长度。

trans-unit.source: Sets the filename filter for this file dialog window to the specified filter.
Sets the filename filter for this file dialog window to the specified filter. Filename filters do not function in Sun's reference implementation for Microsoft Windows.
Sets the filter that determines which rows, if any, should be hidden from the view.
Sets the filter that determines which rows, if any, should be hidden from the view. The filter is applied before sorting. A value of null indicates all values from the model should be included.
Sets the first MIDI tick that will be played in the loop.
Sets the first MIDI tick that will be played in the loop. If the loop count is greater than 0, playback will jump to this point when reaching the loop end point.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个MIDI tick。如果循环次数大于0,当到达循环结束点时,播放将跳到这个点。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop.

Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop. The ending point must be greater than or equal to the starting point, and both must fall within the size of the loaded media. A value of 0 for the starting point means the beginning of the loaded media. Similarly, a value of -1 for the ending point indicates the last frame of the media.

Sets the first and last sample frames that will be played in the loop. The ending point must be greater than or equal to the starting point, and both must fall within the the size of the loaded media. A value of 0 for the starting point means the beginning of the loaded media. Similarly, a value of -1 for the ending point indicates the last frame of the media.
trans-unit.target: 设置将在循环中播放的第一个和最后一个采样帧。结束点必须大于或等于起始点,并且两者都必须在加载媒体的大小范围内。起始点的值为0意味着加载媒体的开始。同样,结束点的值为-1表示媒体的最后一帧。

trans-unit.source: Sets the first line indent.
Sets the flag for enabling rollover borders on the toolbar and it will also install the appropriate border depending on the state of the flag.
Sets the flag indicating whether the timer sends past notifications or not.
trans-unit.target: 设置指示定时器是否发送过去通知的标志。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag that determines whether or not this text component is editable.
Sets the flag that determines whether this list allows multiple selections.

Sets the flag that determines whether this list allows multiple selections. When the selection mode is changed from multiple-selection to single-selection, the selected items change as follows: If a selected item has the location cursor, only that item will remain selected. If no selected item has the location cursor, all items will be deselected.

Sets the flag to indicate if when a notification is received for the unregistration of an MBean referenced in a relation, if an immediate "purge" of the relations (look for the relations no longer valid) has to be performed , or if that will be performed only when the purgeRelations method will be explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 设置标志以指示当收到一个关系中引用的MBean被取消注册的通知时,是否必须执行关系的立即 "清除"(查找不再有效的关系),或者是否只有在显式调用purgeRelations方法时才会执行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flag to indicate if when a notification is received for the unregistration of an MBean referenced in a relation, if an immediate "purge" of the relations (look for the relations no longer valid) has to be performed, or if that will be performed only when the purgeRelations method is explicitly called.
trans-unit.target: 设置标志,用于指示当收到一个关系中引用的MBean被取消注册的通知时,是否需要立即对关系进行 "清除"(查找不再有效的关系),或者是否只有在显式调用purgeRelations方法时才会执行。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags component of this builder.
Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags component of this builder is a copy of the flags in the given array.
trans-unit.target: 设置此生成器的标志组件。返回时,此生成器的flags组件是给定数组中flags的副本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the flags component of this builder. On return, the flags component of this builder is a copy of the given set.
trans-unit.target: 设置此生成器的标志组件。返回时,此生成器的标志组件是给定集合的副本。

trans-unit.source: Sets the floating location.
Sets the floating property.
Sets the focus owner.

Sets the focus owner. The operation will be cancelled if the Component is not focusable. The focus owner is defined as the Component in an application that will typically receive all KeyEvents generated by the user. KeyEvents which map to the focus owner's focus traversal keys will not be delivered if focus traversal keys are enabled for the focus owner. In addition, KeyEventDispatchers may retarget or consume KeyEvents before they reach the focus owner.
Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Component.

Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Component. Refer to Component.setFocusTraversalKeys(int, java.util.Set<? extends java.awt.AWTKeyStroke>) for a complete description of this method.
Sets the focus traversal keys for a given traversal operation for this Container.
Sets the focus traversal policy that will manage keyboard traversal of this Container's children, if this Container is a focus cycle root.

Sets the focus traversal policy that will manage keyboard traversal of this Container's children, if this Container is a focus cycle root. If the argument is null, this Container inherits its policy from its focus- cycle-root ancestor. If the argument is non-null, this policy will be inherited by all focus-cycle-root children that have no keyboard- traversal policy of their own (as will, recursively, their focus-cycle- root children).
Sets the focusable state of this Component to the specified value.
Sets the focusable state of this Component to the specified value. This value overrides the Component's default focusability.
Sets the focused Window.
Sets the focused Window. The focused Window is the Window that is or contains the focus owner. The operation will be cancelled if the specified Window to focus is not a focusable Window.
Sets the font attribute.
Sets the font family.
Sets the font for this component.
Sets the font of this component.
Sets the font of this container.
Sets the font of this object.
Sets the font size attribute.
Sets the font size.
Sets the font to be used for this menu component to the specified font.
Sets the font to be used for this menu component to the specified font. This font is also used by all subcomponents of this menu component, unless those subcomponents specify a different font.
Sets the font to edit with.

Sets the font to edit with. null indicates the renderers font should be used. This will NOT override any font you have set in the editor the receiver was instantiated with. If null for an editor was passed in a default editor will be created that will pick up this font.
Sets the foreground color at index to foreground which can be null, in which case the tab's foreground color will default to the foreground color of this tabbedpane.

Sets the foreground color at index to foreground which can be null, in which case the tab's foreground color will default to the foreground color of this tabbedpane. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
Sets the foreground color for selected cells.
Sets the foreground color for selected cells. Cell renderers can use this color to render text and graphics for selected cells.
Sets the foreground color of this component.
Sets the foreground color of this component. It is up to the look and feel to honor this property, some may choose to ignore it.
Sets the foreground color of this object.
Sets the foreground color.
Sets the format that dictates the legal values that can be edited and displayed.
Sets the format to use for the format element with the given format element index within the previously set pattern string.

Sets the format to use for the format element with the given format element index within the previously set pattern string. The format element index is the zero-based number of the format element counting from the start of the pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式元素的格式,在之前设置的模式字符串中,使用给定的格式元素索引。格式元素的索引是格式元素的零基数,从模式字符串开始算起。

trans-unit.source: Sets the format to use for the format elements within the previously set pattern string that use the given argument index.

Sets the format to use for the format elements within the previously set pattern string that use the given argument index. The argument index is part of the format element definition and represents an index into the arguments array passed to the format methods or the result array returned by the parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 设置格式，以用于先前设置的模式字符串中使用给定参数索引的格式元素。参数索引是格式元素定义的一部分，它表示传递给 format 方法的 arguments 数组或由 parse 方法返回的结果数组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the format elements in the previously set pattern string.
Sets the formats to use for the format elements in the previously set pattern string. The order of formats in newFormats corresponds to the order of format elements in the pattern string.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于先前设置的模式字符串中的format元素的格式。 newFormats 中格式的顺序与模式字符串中格式元素的顺序相对应。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formats to use for the values passed into format methods or returned from parse methods.

Sets the formats to use for the values passed into format methods or returned from parse methods. The indices of elements in newFormats correspond to the argument indices used in the previously set pattern string. The order of formats in newFormats thus corresponds to the order of elements in the arguments array passed to the format methods or the result array returned by the parse methods.
trans-unit.target: 设置用于传递给 format 方法或 parse 方法返回的值的格式。 newFormats 中元素的索引对应于先前设置的模式字符串中使用的参数索引。因此， newFormats 中的格式顺序与传递给 format 方法的 arguments 数组中的元素顺序或由 parse 方法返回的结果数组中的元素顺序相对应。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatter to use if the value of the JFormattedTextField is null.
Sets the four BoundedRangeModel properties after forcing the arguments to obey the usual constraints:
Sets the frame to use for class methods in which a frame is not provided.
Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape based on a specified center Point2D and corner Point2D.
Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape based on a specified center Point2D and corner Point2D. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the specified center point coordinates and corner point coordinates.

Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape based on the specified center point coordinates and corner point coordinates. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape to be the specified Rectangle2D.
Sets the framing rectangle of this Shape to be the specified Rectangle2D. The framing rectangle is used by the subclasses of RectangularShape to define their geometry.
Sets the free standing value.
Sets the full name of this binding.
Sets the full name of this binding. This method must be called to set the full name whenever a NameClassPair is created and a full name is applicable to this binding.
trans-unit.target: 设置此绑定的全名。每当创建 NameClassPair 并且全名适用于此绑定时，都必须调用此方法来设置全名。

trans-unit.source: Sets the general request property.
Sets the general request property. If a property with the key already exists, overwrite its value with the new value.
trans-unit.target: 设置通用请求属性。如果已经存在一个与该键相同的属性,则用新的值覆盖其值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given RowSetMetaData object as the RowSetMetaData object for this RowSet object.

Sets the given RowSetMetaData object as the RowSetMetaData object for this RowSet object. The RowSetReader object associated with the rowset will use RowSetMetaData methods to set the values giving information about the rowset's columns.
Sets the given calendar field to the given value.
Sets the given calendar field to the given value. The value is not interpreted by this method regardless of the leniency mode.
trans-unit.target: 将给定的日历字段设置为给定的值。无论宽松模式如何,该值都不会被本方法解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given calendar field value and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined.

Sets the given calendar field value and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. This means that isSet(field) will return false, and the date and time calculations will treat the field as if it had never been set. A Calendar implementation class may use the field's specific default value for date and time calculations.

Sets the given calendar field value and the time value (millisecond offset from the Epoch) of this Calendar undefined. This means that isSet(field) will return false, and the date and time calculations will treat the field as if it had never been set. A Calendar implementation class may use the field's specific default value for date and time calculations.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的日历字段值和未定义此 Calendar 的时间值（距Epoch的毫秒偏移量）。这意味着 isSet(field) 将返回 false ，并且日期和时间计算将把该字段视为从未设置过。一个 Calendar 实现类可以使用日期和时间计算领域的特定默认值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given catalog name in order to select a subspace of this Connection object's database in which to work.
Sets the given name value pair to the set of headers for this request.
Sets the given name value pair to the set of headers for this request. This overwrites any previously set values for name.
Sets the given role in given relation.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定关系中的角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given role.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given roles in given relation.
trans-unit.target: 在给定关系中设置给定角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given roles.
trans-unit.target: 设置给定的角色。

trans-unit.source: Sets the given schema name to access.
Sets the glassPane property.
Sets the glassPane property. This method is called by the constructor.
Sets the granularity period (in milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 设置粒度周期(以毫秒为单位)。

trans-unit.source: Sets the grid location.
Sets the handling of multiple copies, including collation, for jobs using these attributes to the default.
Sets the handling of multiple copies, including collation, for jobs using these attributes to the default. The default handling is MultipleDocumentHandlingType.SEPARATE_DOCUMENTS_UNCOLLATED_COPIES.
Sets the hash color.
Sets the header's draggedColumn to aColumn.
Sets the header's draggedDistance to distance.
Sets the header's resizingColumn to aColumn.
Sets the height for row to rowHeight, revalidates, and repaints.
Sets the height for row to rowHeight, revalidates, and repaints. The height of the cells in this row will be equal to the row height minus the row margin.
Sets the height of each cell, in pixels.
Sets the height of each cell, in pixels. If the specified value is less than or equal to zero the current cell renderer is queried for each row's height.
Sets the height of each cell.
Sets the height of each cell. If rowHeight is less than or equal to 0 this will throw an IllegalArgumentException.
Sets the height of each cell. If the specified value is less than or equal to zero the current cell renderer is queried for each row's height.
Sets the height, in pixels, of all cells to rowHeight, revalidates, and repaints.
Sets the height, in pixels, of all cells to rowHeight, revalidates, and repaints. The height of the cells will be equal to the row height minus the row margin.
Sets the help menu that appears when the user selects the "help" option in the menu bar.
Sets the help menu that appears when the user selects the "help" option in the menu bar. This method is not yet implemented and will throw an exception.
Sets the high and the low threshold values common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans共同的高和低阈值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the high and the low threshold values.
trans-unit.target: 设置高阈值和低阈值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the high notification's on/off switch value common to all observed MBeans.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有观察到的MBeans通用的高通知的开/关开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the high notification's on/off switch value.
trans-unit.target: 设置高通知的开启/关闭开关值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the highlighter to be used.

Sets the highlighter to be used. By default this will be set by the UI that gets installed. This can be changed to a custom highlighter if desired. The highlighter can be set to null to disable it. A PropertyChange event ("highlighter") is fired when a new highlighter is installed.
Sets the hints that the ImageConsumer uses to process the pixels delivered by the ImageProducer.

Sets the hints that the ImageConsumer uses to process the pixels delivered by the ImageProducer. The ImageProducer can deliver the pixels in any order, but the ImageConsumer may be able to scale or convert the pixels to the destination ColorModel more efficiently or with higher quality if it knows some information about how the pixels will be delivered up front. The setHints method should be called before any calls to any of the setPixels methods with a bit mask of hints about the manner in which the pixels will be delivered. If the ImageProducer does not follow the guidelines for the indicated hint, the results are undefined.
Sets the horizontal alignment of the icon and text.
Sets the horizontal alignment of the icon and text. AbstractButton's default is SwingConstants.CENTER, but subclasses such as JCheckBox may use a different default.
Sets the horizontal alignment of the text.
Sets the horizontal alignment of the text. Valid keys are:
Sets the horizontal alignment.
Sets the horizontal gap between components and between the components and the borders of the Container.
Sets the horizontal gap between components to the specified value.
Sets the horizontal gap between components.
Sets the horizontal position of the label's text, relative to its image.
Sets the horizontal position of the text relative to the icon.
Sets the horizontal scrollbar-display policy.
Sets the horizontal scrollbar-display policy. The options are:
Sets the hostname verifier used by negotiate() after the TLS handshake has completed and the default hostname verification has failed.

Sets the hostname verifier used by negotiate() after the TLS handshake has completed and the default hostname verification has failed. setHostnameVerifier() must be called before negotiate() is invoked for it to have effect. If called after negotiate(), this method does not do anything.
trans-unit.target: 设置TLS握手完成且默认主机名验证失败后，由 negotiate() 使用的主机名验证程序。 setHostnameVerifier() 之前一定要叫 negotiate() 被调用它具有效力。如果在 negotiate() 之后调用，则此方法不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: Sets the hour of this Date object to the specified value. This Date object is modified so that it represents a point in time within the specified hour of the day, with the year, month, date, minute, and second the same as before, as interpreted in the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 将此 Date 对象的小时设置为指定值。修改了此 Date 对象，使其代表一天中指定小时内的某个时间点，并且年，月，日，分钟和秒与以前相同，在本地时区中进行了解释。

trans-unit.source: Sets the human presentable name for the data format that this DataFlavor represents.
Sets the human presentable name for the data format that this DataFlavor represents. This name would be localized for different countries.
Sets the icon at index to icon which can be null.

Sets the icon at index to icon which can be null. This does not set disabled icon at icon. If the new Icon is different than the current Icon and disabled icon is not explicitly set, the LookAndFeel will be asked to generate a disabled Icon. To explicitly set disabled icon, use setDisableIconAt(). The icon is not shown if a tab component for this tab was specified. An internal exception is raised if there is no tab at that index.
Sets the icon attribute.
Sets the icon of the JComboBox.
Sets the icon to display.
Sets the icon to display. If non-null, the look and feel does not provide an icon.
Sets the icon used to represent leaf nodes.
Sets the icon used to represent non-leaf nodes that are expanded.
Sets the icon used to represent non-leaf nodes that are not expanded.
Sets the id of the authorized entity.

Sets the id of the authorized entity. Called by handler only when the id is different from getAuthorizationID(). For example, the id might need to be canonicalized for the environment in which it will be used.
trans-unit.target: 设置授权实体的id。只有当id与getAuthorizationID()不同时,才会被处理程序调用。例如,id可能需要在使用环境中被规范化。

trans-unit.source: Sets the identifier for the table from which this CachedRowSet object was derived to the given table name.

Sets the identifier for the table from which this CachedRowSet object was derived to the given table name. The writer uses this name to determine which table to use when comparing the values in the data source with the CachedRowSet object's values during a synchronization attempt. The table identifier also indicates where modified values from this CachedRowSet object should be written.
Sets the image displayed by this icon.
Sets the image for this TrayIcon.
Sets the image for this TrayIcon. The previous tray icon image is discarded without calling the Image.flush() method — you will need to call it manually.
Sets the image observer for the image.
Sets the image observer for the image. Set this property if the ImageIcon contains an animated GIF, so the observer is notified to update its display. For example:
Sets the image to be displayed as the icon for this window.
Sets the imageable area of this Paper.
Sets the imageable area of this Paper. The imageable area is the area on the page in which printing occurs.
Sets the indent on the first line.
Sets the index of the current animation frame to the specified value and requests that the progress bar be repainted.

Sets the index of the current animation frame to the specified value and requests that the progress bar be repainted. Subclasses that don't use the default painting code might need to override this method to change the way that the repaint method is invoked.
Sets the index of the current animation frame, to the next valid value, which results in the progress bar being repainted.

Sets the index of the current animation frame, to the next valid value, which results in the progress bar being repainted. The next valid value is, by default, the current animation index plus one. If the new value would be too large, this method sets the index to 0. Subclasses might need to override this method to ensure that the index does not go over the number of frames needed for the particular progress bar instance. This method is invoked by the default animation thread every X milliseconds, where X is specified by the "ProgressBar.repaintInterval" UI default.
Sets the indices of the destination bands where data will be placed.
Sets the indices of the destination bands where data will be placed. Duplicate indices are not allowed.

Sets the indices of the source bands to be used. Duplicate indices are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 设置要使用的源波段的指数。不允许有重复的指数。

Sets the input source to use to the given ImageInputStream or other Object.

Sets the input source to use to the given ImageInputStream or other Object. The input source must be set before any of the query or read methods are used. If input is null, any currently set input source will be removed. In any case, the value of minIndex will be initialized to 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置要用于给定 ImageInputStream 或其他 Object 的输入源。在使用任何查询或读取方法之前，必须设置输入源。如果 input 为 null ，则将删除任何当前设置的输入源。无论如何， minIndex 的值都将初始化为0。

Note that this method is invoked internally by the option pane (in response to user action) and should generally not be called by client programs. Sets the issuerNames criterion. The issuer distinguished name in the X509CRL must match at least one of the specified distinguished names. If null, any issuer distinguished name will do.
trans-unit.target: 设置issuerNames条件。 X509CRL 中的颁发者专有名称必须至少与指定的专有名称之一匹配。如果为 null ，则将使用任何发行者专有名称。

trans-unit.source: Sets the italic attribute.
Sets the item that should be edited.

Sets the iterator to point to the collation element corresponding to the specified character (the parameter is a CHARACTER offset in the original string, not an offset into its corresponding sequence of collation elements).

Sets the iterator to point to the collation element corresponding to the specified character (the parameter is a CHARACTER offset in the original string, not an offset into its corresponding sequence of collation elements). The value returned by the next call to next() will be the collation element corresponding to the specified position in the text. If that position is in the middle of a contracting character sequence, the result of the next call to next() is the collation element for that sequence. This means that getOffset() is not guaranteed to return the same value as was passed to a preceding call to setOffset().
trans-unit.target: 将迭代器设置为指向指定字符对应的整理元素(参数是原始字符串中的CHARACTER偏移量,而不是进入其对应的整理元素序列的偏移量)。下一次调用 next()返回的值将是文本中指定位置对应的整理元素。如果该位置位于收缩字符序列的中间,那么下一次调用 next()的结果就是该序列的整理元素。这意味着getOffset()不能保证返回与之前调用setOffset()时传递的值相同。

trans-unit.source: Sets the key accelerator that will cause the receiving text component to get the focus.

Sets the key accelerator that will cause the receiving text component to get the focus. The accelerator will be the key combination of the platform-specific modifier key and the character given (converted to upper case). For example, the ALT key is used as a modifier on Windows and the CTRL+ALT combination is used on Mac. By default, there is no focus accelerator key. Any previous key accelerator setting will be superseded. A '\0' key setting will be registered, and has the effect of turning off the focus accelerator. When the new key is set, a PropertyChange event (FOCUS_ACCELERATOR_KEY) will be fired.
Sets the key binding activity.
Sets the key binding registration.
Sets the key combination which invokes the menu item's action listeners without navigating the menu hierarchy.

Sets the key combination which invokes the menu item's action listeners without navigating the menu hierarchy. It is the UI's responsibility to install the correct action. Note that when the keyboard accelerator is typed, it will work whether or not the menu is currently displayed.
Sets the key pair (public key and private key) for this signer.
trans-unit.target: 设置该签字人的密钥对(公钥和私钥)。

Sets the keyUsage criterion.

Sets the keyUsage criterion. The X509Certificate must allow the specified keyUsage values. If null, no keyUsage check will be done. Note that an X509Certificate that has no keyUsage extension implicitly allows all keyUsage values.
trans-unit.target: 设置keyUsage标准。在 X509Certificate 必须允许使用指定的keyUsage值。如果为 null ，则不会进行keyUsage检查。请注意，没有keyUsage扩展名的 X509Certificate 隐式允许所有keyUsage值。

Sets the keyboard mnemonic for accessing the specified tab.
Sets the keyboard mnemonic for accessing the specified tab. The mnemonic is the key which when combined with the look and feel's mouseless modifier (usually Alt) will activate the specified tab.

Sets the keyboard mnemonic on the current model. The mnemonic is the key which when combined with the look and feel's mouseless modifier (usually Alt) will activate this button if focus is contained somewhere within this button's ancestor window.
Sets the keymap to use for binding events to actions.
Sets the keymap to use for binding events to actions. Setting to null effectively disables keyboard input. A PropertyChange event ("keymap") is fired when a new keymap is installed.

Sets the language-sensitive orientation that is to be used to order the elements or text within this component. Language-sensitive LayoutManager and Component subclasses will use this property to determine how to lay out and draw components.
Sets the language.
Sets the language. If language is the empty string or null, the language in this Builder is removed. Otherwise, the language must be well-formed or an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 设置语言。如果 language 是空字符串或null，则将删除此 Builder 中的语言。否则，该语言必须格式正确，否则将引发异常。

Sets the layout manager for this container, refer to Container.setLayout(LayoutManager) for a complete description of this method.

Sets the layout manager for this container. This method is overridden to prevent the layout mgr from being set.

Sets the lead selection index, ensuring that values between the anchor and the new lead are either all selected or all deselected. If the value at the anchor index is selected, first clear all the values in the range [anchor, oldLeadIndex], then select all the values values in the range [anchor, newLeadIndex], where oldLeadIndex is the old leadIndex and newLeadIndex is the new one.

trans-unit.target: 设置字符序列的长度。该序列将被改变为一个新的字符序列,其长度由参数指定。对于每一个非负的索引

trans-unit.source: Sets the limit for the maximum number of bytes that can be returned for character and binary column values in a ResultSet object produced by this Statement object.

Sets the limit for the maximum number of bytes that can be returned for character and binary column values in a ResultSet object produced by this Statement object. This limit applies only to BINARY, VARBINARY, LONGVARBINARY, CHAR, VARCHAR, NCHAR, NVARCHAR, LONGNVARCHAR and LONGVARCHAR fields. If the limit is exceeded, the excess data is silently discarded. For maximum portability, use values greater than 256.
Sets the limit for the maximum number of rows that any ResultSet object generated by this Statement object can contain to the given number.

Sets the limit for the maximum number of rows that any ResultSet object generated by this Statement object can contain to the given number. If the limit is exceeded, the excess rows are silently dropped.
Sets the limits of this matcher's region.

Sets the limits of this matcher's region. The region is the part of the input sequence that will be searched to find a match. Invoking this method resets the matcher, and then sets the region to start at the index specified by the start parameter and end at the index specified by the end parameter.
trans-unit.target: 设置此匹配器区域的限制。该区域是输入序列的一部分，将对其进行搜索以找到匹配项。调用此方法将重置匹配器，然后将区域设置为从 start 参数指定的索引处开始，到 end 参数指定的索引处结束。

Sets the maximum number of bytes that can be returned for a column value to the given number of bytes. This limit applies only to BINARY, VARBINARY, LONGVARBINARYBINARY, CHAR, VARCHAR, LONGVARCHAR, NCHAR and NVARCHAR columns. If the limit is exceeded, the excess data is silently discarded. For maximum portability, use values greater than 256.
Sets the maximum number of bytes that can be used for a column value in this RowSet object to the given number.

Sets the maximum number of bytes that can be used for a column value in this RowSet object to the given number. This limit applies only to columns that hold values of the following types: BINARY, VARBINARY, LONGVARBINARY, CHAR, VARCHAR, and LONGVARCHAR. If the limit is exceeded, the excess data is silently discarded. For maximum portability, it is advisable to use values greater than 256.
Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number.

Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number. For formatting numbers other than BigInteger and BigDecimal objects, the lower of newValue and 340 is used. Negative input values are replaced with 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置数字的小数部分中允许的最大位数。要格式化 BigInteger 和 BigDecimal 对象以外的数字，请使用 newValue 和340中的较低者。负输入值将替换为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number. maximumFractionDigits must be ≥ minimumFractionDigits.

Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the fraction portion of a number. maximumFractionDigits must be ≥ minimumFractionDigits. If the new value for maximumFractionDigits is less than the current value of minimumFractionDigits, then minimumFractionDigits will also be set to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 设置数字的小数部分中允许的最大位数。maximumFractionDigits必须≥minimumFractionDigits。如果maximumFractionDigits的新值小于minimumFractionDigits的当前值，则minimumFractionDigits也将设置为新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number.

Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number. For formatting numbers other than BigInteger and BigDecimal objects, the lower of newValue and 309 is used. Negative input values are replaced with 0.
trans-unit.target: 设置数字的整数部分中允许的最大位数。要格式化 BigInteger 和 BigDecimal 对象以外的数字，请使用 newValue 和309中的较低者。负输入值将替换为0。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number. maximumIntegerDigits must be ≥ minimumIntegerDigits.

Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number. maximumIntegerDigits must be ≥ minimumIntegerDigits. If the new value for maximumIntegerDigits is less than the current value of minimumIntegerDigits, then minimumIntegerDigits will also be set to the new value.
trans-unit.target: 设置数字的整数部分中允许的最大位数。maximumIntegerDigits必须≥minimumIntegerDigits。如果maximumIntegerDigits的新值小于minimumIntegerDigits的当前值，则minimumIntegerDigits也将设置为新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of edits this UndoManager holds.

Sets the maximum number of edits this UndoManager holds. A value less than 0 indicates the number of edits is not limited. If edits need to be discarded to shrink the limit, die will be invoked on them in the reverse order they were added. The default is 100.
Sets the maximum number of entries to be returned as a result of the search.
trans-unit.target: 设置搜索结果中要返回的最大条目数。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum number of rows that this RowSet object can contain to the specified number.
Sets the maximum number of rows that this RowSet object can contain to the specified number. If the limit is exceeded, the excess rows are silently dropped.
Sets the maximum number of rows that this RowSet object may contain to the given number.
Sets the maximum number of rows that this RowSet object may contain to the given number. If this limit is exceeded, the excess rows are silently dropped.
Sets the maximum number of rows the JComboBox displays.
Sets the maximum number of rows the JComboBox displays. If the number of objects in the model is greater than count, the combo box uses a scrollbar.
Sets the maximum number of sort keys.

Sets the maximum number of sort keys. The number of sort keys determines how equal values are resolved when sorting. For example, assume a table row sorter is created and setMaxSortKeys(2) is invoked on it. The user clicks the header for column 1, causing the table rows to be sorted based on the items in column 1. Next, the user clicks the header for column 2, causing the table to be sorted based on the items in column 2; if any items in column 2 are equal, then those particular rows are ordered based on the items in column 1. In this case, we say that the rows are primarily sorted on column 2, and secondarily on column 1. If the user then clicks the header for column 3, then the items are primarily sorted on column 3 and secondarily sorted on column 2. Because the maximum number of sort keys has been set to 2 with setMaxSortKeys, column 1 no longer has an effect on the order.
Sets the maximum period a Connection or objects created from the Connection will wait for the database to reply to any one request.

Sets the maximum period a Connection or objects created from the Connection will wait for the database to reply to any one request. If any request remains unanswered, the waiting method will return with a SQLException, and the Connection or objects created from the Connection will be marked as closed. Any subsequent use of the objects, with the exception of the close, isClosed or Connection.isValid methods, will result in a SQLException.
Sets the maximum permissible value.
Sets the maximum permissible value. If the valueClass has not been specified, and max is non null, the valueClass will be set to that of the class of max.
Sets the maximum priority of the group.
Sets the maximum priority of the group. Threads in the thread group that already have a higher priority are not affected.
trans-unit.target: 设置线程组的最大优先级。线程组中已经有较高优先级的线程不受影响。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum queue length for incoming connection indications (a request to connect) to the count argument.
Sets the maximum queue length for incoming connection indications (a request to connect) to the count argument. If a connection indication arrives when the queue is full, the connection is refused.
trans-unit.target: 将传入连接指示（连接请求）的最大队列长度设置为 count 参数。如果在队列已满时出现连接指示，则拒绝连接。

trans-unit.source: Sets the maximum size of this component to a constant value.
Sets the maximum size of this component to a constant value. Subsequent calls to getMaximumSize will always return this value. Setting the maximum size to null restores the default behavior.

Sets the maximum size of this component to a constant value. Subsequent calls to getMaximumSize will always return this value; the component's UI will not be asked to compute it. Setting the maximum size to null restores the default behavior.
Sets the maximum time in seconds that a driver will wait while attempting to connect to a database once the driver has been identified.
Sets the maximum time in seconds that this data source will wait while attempting to connect to a database.

Sets the maximum time in seconds that this data source will wait while attempting to connect to a database. A value of zero specifies that the timeout is the default system timeout if there is one; otherwise, it specifies that there is no timeout. When a DataSource object is created, the login timeout is initially zero.
